title: Restore the user-provided hero product photo

requirements.text: Update the landing page hero product photo to use the same user-provided image that was previously added (i.e., revert the current hero image change). Specifically, change the centralized hero image path constant (HERO_IMAGE_SRC in frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts) from the current file to the user-provided image file located in the static assets directory (frontend/public/assets/generated), and ensure the Hero section renders that image without any broken links.

quotes: you change photo please add same photo which i add

acceptanceCriteria: HERO_IMAGE_SRC in frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts no longer points to /assets/generated/product-hero-v2.dim_1600x1200.png and instead points to the user-provided image filename that exists under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The Hero section image renders correctly on the landing page (no 404/missing image) and continues to use the centralized HERO_IMAGE_SRC constant (no hardcoded image path added to the component).
No other landing page content, layout, or theme styling changes as part of this update.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited (per SYSTEM_CONTEXT).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Creating a new hero image or redesigning the landing page theme.
Changing product name, pricing, checkout flow, or UPI configuration.
Adding any backend changes or order-flow changes.
